title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 654.5 - Interest
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 654.5 - Interest

State Regulations

Tax Law, ยง 263
(a) Where the refund check is issued by the recording officer more than 90 days
after the date that the application for such refund is received by the
commissioner in processible form, interest amounting to $1 or more shall be
allowed upon such refund. (b) Where
interest is to be paid on a refund as provided in subdivision (a) of this
section, such interest shall accrue at the applicable rate as described in Part
653 of this Title, for each month or a fraction of a month for the period from
the date the application for refund is received by the commissioner in
processible form to a date preceding the date of the refund check by not more
than 30 days. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
654.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
